text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Today's meeting ends here.
Thank you for your hard work, everyone.

It's about our work!
Thank you too, Producer-san!

That's right.
Thank you.
Thank you...
Haha, it's returned threefold!
Hehe... / Hehe / Ahaha

Oh! Hey, do you two have time after this?
How about some tea?
Oh... I have something to do afterward...

Good work—Oops!
Sorry! Are you still in a meeting?

No, we just finished.
Is ALSTROEMERIA using this place next?

Not Amana's group~
One person from each unit has been called.
Is that so?

Yeah...
...So, we can't go for tea... Sorry.
My bad, I should have mentioned it too.
We can't all be here, so I thought I'd give you a head start.

I see!
Then it's probably best if we leave early!

Yeah,
let's tidy up quickly, Meguru.
Yes, yes!
We still have time, so let's take it easy and—
Oh?
Once again, thank you all for gathering here.

Now, let me get straight to the point
regarding why I called you all together.

We've decided that 283PRO will hold a
live concert with everyone.

Wow... / Live!? / Wow! / Whoa~! /
Is that true?
Everyone, as in everyone?

Of course.
All 28 members.
It's going to be a fun concert!

Yes!
I'm excited to be together with everyone!
We won't lose to anyone!

...Creating a stage with everyone from 283PRO...
I'm looking forward to it...
Yeah, it'll be fun.
There might even be songs where all of us sing together!
That means all 28 of us have to practice together!
Hehe, it sounds tough but fun!

Haha... having everyone together...
well, we'll do it.
Yeah, I think everyone has their own thoughts about this.

If you notice anything after hearing the explanation,
feel free to speak up.
Yes... / Yeah~! / Sure! / Yes!
Yepp! / Yes / Understood.
